TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit LinkedList`1<T> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class LinkedList(Of T) Implements ICollection, ICollection(Of T), IDeserializationCallback, IEnumerable(Of T), IReadOnlyCollection(Of T), ISerializable

generic <typename T> public ref class LinkedList : System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyCollection<T>, System::Collections::ICollection, System::Runtime::Serialization::IDeserializationCallback, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

type LinkedList<'T> = class interface ICollection<'T> interface ICollection interface IReadOnlyCollection<'T> interface ISerializable interface IDeserializationCallback interface seq<'T> interface IEnumerable

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 指定連結清單的項目類型。

span.span: Specifies the element type of the linked list.

summary.span: 代表雙向連結串列。

span.span: Represents a doubly linked list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一般用途連結的清單。 is a general-purpose linked list. 它支援列舉值，並實作介面，配合.NET Framework 中的其他集合類別。It supports enumerators and implements the interface, consistent with other collection classes in the .NET Framework. 提供不同的節點型別的，因此插入和移除是 o （1） 作業。 provides separate nodes of type , so insertion and removal are O(1) operations. 您可以移除節點，然後重新插入，在相同的清單，或在另一個清單中，會導致在堆積上配置的任何其他物件。You can remove nodes and reinsert them, either in the same list or in another list, which results in no additional objects allocated on the heap. 因為清單也會維護內部的計數，取得屬性是 o （1） 的作業。Because the list also maintains an internal count, getting the property is an O(1) operation. 在每個節點物件屬於下列類型。Each node in a object is of the type . 因為雙向連結時，每個節點指向向前節點並回溯至節點。Because the is doubly linked, each node points forward to the node and backward to the node. 節點和它的值一次建立時包含參考類型的清單比較好。Lists that contain reference types perform better when a node and its value are created at the same time. 接受`null`視為有效參考的屬性類型，並允許重複的值。 accepts `null` as a valid property for reference types and allows duplicate values. 如果是空的並屬性包含`null`。If the is empty, the and properties contain `null`. 類別不支援鏈結、 分割、 循環或其他功能，可以將清單保留不一致的狀態。The class does not support chaining, splitting, cycles, or other features that can leave the list in an inconsistent state. 清單會保持在單一執行緒上一致的。The list remains consistent on a single thread. 唯一支援的多執行緒的案例是多執行緒的讀取的作業。The only multithreaded scenario supported by is multithreaded read operations. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的許多功能類別。The following code example demonstrates many features of the class. [!code-cpp[Generic.LinkedList#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.LinkedList/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Generic.LinkedList#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.LinkedList/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.LinkedList#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.LinkedList/vb/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此類型不是安全執行緒。

span.span: This type is not thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 如果需要存取多個執行緒，您必須實作自己的同步處理機制。

span.span: If the needs to be accessed by multiple threads, you will need to implement their own synchronization mechanism.

threadsafe.span: A可支援多個讀取器同時，只要不修改集合。

span.span: A can support multiple readers concurrently, as long as the collection is not modified.

threadsafe.span: 即便如此，透過集合列舉是本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

span.span: Even so, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 在極少數的案例，其中列舉競用權限寫入，就必須在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。

span.span: In the rare case where an enumeration contends with write accesses, the collection must be locked during the entire enumeration.

threadsafe.span: 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。

span.span: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.

summary.span: 傳回在 中逐一查看的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + + `For Each` Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 。 returns the same object until is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 您不能再次將 設定為集合的第一個項目；您必須建立新的列舉值執行個體。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉值會將永久失效，而且下次呼叫或是就會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation.

span.span: if the is read-only; otherwise, .

value.span: 在 的預設實作中，這個屬性一律會傳回 。

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 是唯讀的集合是可防止修改集合的包裝函式集合因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + + `For Each` Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 。 returns the same object until is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 您不能再次將 設定為集合的第一個項目；您必須建立新的列舉值執行個體。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉值會將永久失效，而且下次呼叫或是就會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示對 的存取是否同步 (安全執行緒)。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果 的存取為同步 (安全執行緒)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .

value.span: 在 的預設實作中，這個屬性一律會傳回 。

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 傳回的物件，可用來同步存取。 returns an object that can be used to synchronize access to the . 同步處理是所有執行緒存取集合之前都鎖定這個物件時，才有效。Synchronization is effective only if all threads lock this object before accessing the collection. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation.
